definition[0]: used to say that someone or something is not a particular thing, or does not do a particular thing
example[1]: a non-smoker  (=someone who does not smoke)
example[2]: a nonstop flight  (=one in which a plane flies from one place to another without stopping on the way)
definition[1]: used to refer to a situation where a particular action did not happen or will not happen
example[4]: They were very disappointed at his non-appearance  (=the fact that he did not go to an event where he was expected).
